body_text: I chose undefined specifically, and I think being explicit about that choice is best. Also, I think the linter complains when you have branches in a function that don't return an explicit value when other branches do, so return; would fail linting.
body: [I chose undefined specifically](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/816#discussion_r123776562), and I think being explicit about that choice is best. Also, I think the linter complains when you have branches in a function that don't return an explicit value when other branches do, so `return;` would fail linting.
body_html: I chose undefined specifically, and I think being explicit about that choice is best. Also, I think the linter complains when you have branches in a function that don't return an explicit value when other branches do, so return; would fail linting.
